thread.title: Etisalat partners with Al Jazira Sports Club
thread.title_full: Etisalat partners with Al Jazira Sports Club | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Etisalat partners with Al Jazira Sports Club
text:
(MENAFN Press) Etisalat signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Al Jazira Sports Club, to enhance operational efficiencies through implementation of advanced telecommunications and ICT services. 

The agreement was signed by Ayed Mabkhout, Al Jazira Team Director and Jamal saeed Alnuaimi - General Manager of Abu Dhabi region, Etisalat, at the telco's stands on the sidelines of GITEX Technology Week 2015.

The MoU will enable Etisalat and Al Jazeera Sport Club forge partnership to achieve strategic goals, exchange technology knowhow and experiences. The joint efforts will help the sports club improve operational performance and simplify procedures.
